A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie feels overlong and bloated with the events not quite coming together and the character development is just not there for many of the characters . The pacing and the editing is way off .The directing feels weird sometime\, but mostly it's beatiful. It's a really pretty film\, it has some of the most beautiful and striking moments in any Star Wars film.

I don't think the director cared that much about making a Star Wars film\, he cared much more about "deconstructing" Star Wars film\, where the traditional Star Wars elements are downplayed and he introduces a lot of his personal politics to the world..

A much beloved character is really humiliated and not done justice at all\, I can't really enjoy the movie after that.
